summary: Completed frontend testing of ZWAP! Coin PWA UI fixes. All requested changes verified working correctly: logos swapped correctly (ZWAP_LOGO on splash/welcome, ZWAP_BANG in header), tagline present, WHAT IS ZWAP button has proper styling, NewsTicker is thicker and transitions every 8 seconds, header shows Connect button next to balances when not connected.

issues: Minor 9px overlap between ticker progress bar and navigation - ticker text is fully visible and not cut off, only the progress bar slightly overlaps. This is cosmetic and does not affect readability.
React warning: 'Cannot update a component while rendering a different component' in BrowserRouter/AppContent - minor React state management issue, does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Splash screen shows ZWAP_LOGO (full logo with text) - VERIFIED
Splash screen shows tagline 'The Crypto Faucet That Moves With You' - VERIFIED
Splash screen 'WHAT IS ZWAP!?' has button styling (border-2, rounded-full) - VERIFIED
Splash screen ENTER button works - VERIFIED
Welcome screen shows ZWAP_LOGO with tagline underneath - VERIFIED
AppHeader shows ZWAP_BANG (3D bang logo) - VERIFIED
AppHeader shows balances (0/0) even when not connected - VERIFIED
AppHeader shows Connect button next to balances when wallet not connected - VERIFIED
AppHeader shows profile badge when wallet connected - VERIFIED
AppHeader hides Connect button when wallet connected - VERIFIED
NewsTicker is visible and not cut off by bottom navigation - VERIFIED (text fully visible)
NewsTicker text is readable (text-sm, py-3 padding) - VERIFIED
NewsTicker transitions slowly (8 second intervals) - VERIFIED
Dashboard loads with all 4 feature buttons (MOVE, PLAY, SHOP, SWAP) - VERIFIED
PlayTab loads with games grid (4 games) - VERIFIED
critical_code_review_comments: All requested UI changes implemented correctly
Logo swap working: ZWAP_LOGO on splash/welcome, ZWAP_BANG in header
NewsTicker timing changed from 5000ms to 8000ms as requested
NewsTicker padding increased from py-2 to py-3 as requested
WHAT IS ZWAP button now has proper border and rounded-full styling
test_credentials: Wallet connection uses demo addresses (no real wallet required)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI fixes verified working. Key changes: 1) ZWAP_LOGO used on splash/welcome screens, ZWAP_BANG used in header 2) Tagline 'The Crypto Faucet That Moves With You' present on splash and welcome 3) WHAT IS ZWAP button has border-2 border-cyan-500/50 rounded-full styling 4) NewsTicker at bottom-[68px] with py-3 padding and 8000ms interval 5) Header shows balances + Connect button when not connected, balances + profile badge when connected. Leaderboard data in NewsTicker is MOCKED.
